question:
Which among the following statements is/ are correct about the Ratha Yatra festival of Odisha?
1. It begins from the 2nd day of the bright half of Ashadha (June- July)
2. It is a famous festival in the Puri district
3. It is associated with the sacred journey of Lord Jagannath, Balabhadra, Subhadra
4. It is also known as Car festival
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Ratha Yatra festival or the Car Festival is famous in Puri district in Odisha. It is associated with the sacred journey of Lord Jagannath, his brother Balabhadra and his sister Subhadra. It begins from the 2nd day of the bright half of Ashadha (June- July)
